GR13malinivu:1618: 23.35cd: tatraiva yadi kālasya niyamena rato bhavet
GR13malinivu:1619: 23.36ab: tadā prathamayāme tu vatsareṇa śubhāśubham 23.36cd: ṣaṭtrimāsena kramaśo dvitīyādiṣv
GR13malinivu:1622: 23.38ab: kva cit kārye samutpanne suptajñānam upākramet
GR13malinivu:1623: 23.38cd: ity etat kathitaṃ devi siddhayogīśvarīmatam 23.39ab: nātaḥ parataraṃ jñānaṃ śivādyavanigocare
GR13malinivu:1624: 23.39cd: ya evaṃ tattvato veda sa śivo nātra saṃśayaḥ 23.40ab: tasya pādarajaḥ mūrdhni dhṛtaṃ pāpapraśāntaye 23.40cd: etac chrutvā mahādevī paraṃ saṃtoṣam āgatā
GR13malinivu:1625: 23.41ab: evaṃ kṣamāpayām āsa praṇipatya punaḥ punaḥ
GR13malinivu:1626: 23.41cd: iti vaḥ sarvam ākhyātaṃ mālinīvijayottaram 23.42ab: mamaitat kathitaṃ devyā yogāmṛtam anuttamam 23.42cd: bhavadbhir api nākhyeyam aśiṣyāṇām idaṃ mahat
GR13malinivu:1627: 23.43ab: na cāpi paraśiṣyāṇām aparīkṣya prayatnataḥ 23.43cd: sarvathaitat samākhyātaṃ yogābhyāsaratātmanām
GR13malinivu:1629: 23.44cd: kārtikeyāt samāsādya jñānāmṛtam idaṃ mahat 23.45ab: manayo yogam abhyasya parāṃ siddhim upāgatāḥ
